org.javascool
Class LinkCheck

java.lang.Object
  org.javascool.LinkCheck

public class LinkCheck
extends Object

This factory encapsulates a java implemented link check.

See Also:
source code

Method Detail

check

public static void check(String location,
                         boolean recursive)
Checks links in a HTML text.

Parameters:
location - The HTML URL which links are to be checked.
recursive - If true, links in URL files in sub-directories with HTML extensions are also checked.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If the URL is malformed.

getAnchors

public static String[] getAnchors(String text)
Returns all anchors in a given HTML text.
Here all <a name=.. < id=.. attributes are considered as anchors.

getLinks

public static String[] getLinks(String text)
Returns all links in a given HTML text.
Here all <a href=.. <img src=.. attributes are considered as links.

isReadable

public static boolean isReadable(String location)
Checks if an URL is readable.

Parameters:
location - The URL to be checked.
Returns:
True if readable else false.
Throws:
IllegalArgumentException - If the URL is malformed.

main

public static void main(String[] usage)
Checks links in a HTML text.

Parameters:
usage - java org.javascool.LinkCheck [-recursive] location to check links at the given HTTP location, and optionnaly recurse in sub-directories.
